snippet: Torrential rain and floods washed away buildings and roads, killing at least 23 people in the northern Indian state of Uttarakhand, officials said Monday.
abstract: Torrential rain and floods wash away buildings and roads in northern Indian state of Uttarakhand, killing at least 23 people.
lead_paragraph: Torrential rain and floods washed away buildings and roads, killing at least 23 people in the northern Indian state of Uttarakhand, officials said Monday.

headline.main: Floods in India Kill at Least 23
